001// Copyright (c) FIRST and other WPILib contributors.
002// Open Source Software; you can modify and/or share it under the terms of

004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.hal.FRCNetComm.tResourceType;
008import edu.wpi.first.hal.HAL;
009import edu.wpi.first.hal.util.AllocationException;
010import edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.Sendable;
011import edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.SendableBuilder;
012import edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.SendableRegistry;
013
014/**
015 * Class for operating a compressor connected to a pneumatics module. The module will automatically
016 * run in closed loop mode by default whenever a {@link Solenoid} object is created. For most cases,
017 * a Compressor object does not need to be instantiated or used in a robot program. This class is
018 * only required in cases where the robot program needs a more detailed status of the compressor or
019 * to enable/disable closed loop control.
020 *
021 * <p>Note: you cannot operate the compressor directly from this class as doing so would circumvent
022 * the safety provided by using the pressure switch and closed loop control. You can only turn off
023 * closed loop control, thereby stopping the compressor from operating.
024 */
025public class Compressor implements Sendable, AutoCloseable {
026  private PneumaticsBase m_module;
027
028  /**
029   * Constructs a compressor for a specified module and type.
030   *
031   * @param module The module ID to use.
032   * @param moduleType The module type to use.
033   */
034  public Compressor(int module, PneumaticsModuleType moduleType) {
035    m_module = PneumaticsBase.getForType(module, moduleType);
036    boolean allocatedCompressor = false;
037    boolean successfulCompletion = false;
038
039    try {
040      if (!m_module.reserveCompressor()) {
041        throw new AllocationException("Compressor already allocated");
042      }
043
044      allocatedCompressor = true;
045
046      m_module.enableCompressorDigital();
047
048      HAL.report(tResourceType.kResourceType_Compressor, module + 1);
049      SendableRegistry.addLW(this, "Compressor", module);
050      successfulCompletion = true;
051
052    } finally {
053      if (!successfulCompletion) {
054        if (allocatedCompressor) {
055          m_module.unreserveCompressor();
056        }
057        m_module.close();
058      }
059    }
060  }
061
062  /**
063   * Constructs a compressor for a default module and specified type.
064   *
065   * @param moduleType The module type to use.
066   */
067  public Compressor(PneumaticsModuleType moduleType) {
068    this(PneumaticsBase.getDefaultForType(moduleType), moduleType);
069  }
070
071  @Override
072  public void close() {
073    SendableRegistry.remove(this);
074    m_module.unreserveCompressor();
075    m_module.close();
076    m_module = null;
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * Start the compressor running in closed loop control mode.
081   *
082   * <p>Use the method in cases where you would like to manually stop and start the compressor for
083   * applications such as conserving battery or making sure that the compressor motor doesn't start
084   * during critical operations.
085   *
086   * @deprecated Use enableDigital() instead.
087   */
088  @Deprecated(since = "2022", forRemoval = true)
089  public void start() {
090    enableDigital();
091  }
092
093  /**
094   * Stop the compressor from running in closed loop control mode.
095   *
096   * <p>Use the method in cases where you would like to manually stop and start the compressor for
097   * applications such as conserving battery or making sure that the compressor motor doesn't start
098   * during critical operations.
099   *
100   * @deprecated Use disable() instead.
101   */
102  @Deprecated(since = "2022", forRemoval = true)
103  public void stop() {
104    disable();
105  }
106
107  /**
108   * Get the status of the compressor.
109   *
110   * @return true if the compressor is on
111   */
112  public boolean enabled() {
113    return m_module.getCompressor();
114  }
115
116  /**
117   * Get the pressure switch value.
118   *
119   * @return true if the pressure is low
120   */
121  public boolean getPressureSwitchValue() {
122    return m_module.getPressureSwitch();
123  }
124
125  /**
126   * Get the current being used by the compressor.
127   *
128   * @return current consumed by the compressor in amps
129   */
130  public double getCurrent() {
131    return m_module.getCompressorCurrent();
132  }
133
134  /** Disable the compressor. */
135  public void disable() {
136    m_module.disableCompressor();
137  }
138
139  /** Enable compressor closed loop control using digital input. */
140  public void enableDigital() {
141    m_module.enableCompressorDigital();
142  }
143
144  /**
145   * Enable compressor closed loop control using analog input.
146   *
147   * <p>On CTRE PCM, this will enable digital control.
148   *
149   * @param minAnalogVoltage The minimum voltage to enable compressor
150   * @param maxAnalogVoltage The maximum voltage to disable compressor
151   */
152  public void enableAnalog(double minAnalogVoltage, double maxAnalogVoltage) {
153    m_module.enableCompressorAnalog(minAnalogVoltage, maxAnalogVoltage);
154  }
155
156  /**
157   * Enable compressor closed loop control using hybrid input.
158   *
159   * <p>On CTRE PCM, this will enable digital control.
160   *
161   * @param minAnalogVoltage The minimum voltage to enable compressor
162   * @param maxAnalogVoltage The maximum voltage to disable compressor
163   */
164  public void enableHybrid(double minAnalogVoltage, double maxAnalogVoltage) {
165    m_module.enableCompressorHybrid(minAnalogVoltage, maxAnalogVoltage);
166  }
167
168  /**
169   * Gets the current operating mode of the Compressor.
170   *
171   * @return true if compressor is operating on closed-loop mode
172   */
173  public CompressorConfigType getConfigType() {
174    return m_module.getCompressorConfigType();
175  }
176
177  @Override
178  public void initSendable(SendableBuilder builder) {
179    builder.setSmartDashboardType("Compressor");
180    builder.addBooleanProperty("Enabled", this::enabled, null);
181    builder.addBooleanProperty("Pressure switch", this::getPressureSwitchValue, null);
182  }
183}
